TEXT.TITLE: SECURITY TAG SYSTEMS <STAG> GETS RECORD ORDER
TEXT.BODY: Security Tag Systems Inc said its British-based affiliate received a three mln dlr order of electronic article surveillance equipment, the largest in the company's history. It said it received the order from a British chain of speciality clothing stores. Reuter
